line: listen i need to ask you something

pee on your own time mike

hello everyone and thank you all for being here tonight
so tomorrows the big event and some of you might not know but mike and i did not get off to the best start
my friend joey and i decided to fix each other up with friends so i i

so ok uh i can forget that
i can forget that and uhm
oh but you need to know that to

we are gonna have hair and make up going on in the bathroom and oh i had to move a couple of things in the fridge to make room for the corsages

whoever you pick is gonna walk down the aisle with you
now i promise i will not say a word but if you pick chandler he is gonna be whispering stupid jokes in your ear the whole time
oh you are the lesser of two evils
sven i do not understand what you are saying
what is wrong with the flowers
listen mike if you were swedish and you were saying the word lorkins what flowers would that be
may i have a word with you please
last night i tried to welcome you into my family
are you rehearsing for some really bad mafia movie
and yes i may be borrowing a few lines from my recent unsuccessful audition for family honor 2 thissa time itsa personal

i want you to take this seriously
phoebe is very very important to me ok
and i wanna make sure that you are gonna take care of her
she is the single most important thing in my life
die before i let anything happen to her

because she is family ok and now you are gonna be family and there is nothing more important in the whole world than family

hey can i talk to you about this groomsman thing

but if you choose me you will be getting some comedy
even so i think gonna pick ross
let me tell you why you need to pick me
see when i was a kid i was always left out of everything you know and it really made me feel
you know i was always picked last in gym
even behind that big fat exchange student who did not even know the rules to baseball
i mean this guy would strike out and then run to third
anyway if the only one left out of this wedding i just know that all those feelings are gonna come rushing back
all right fine i pick you
we are gonna do it my way
